name: Long Animals
description:
Made in 48 hours for the "Beans Game Jam" (theme: "Animals and Boxes").

This game is based on the famous Tower of Hanoi puzzle.

You must move all the animals to the space marked "Goal" without ever placing a longer animal on top of a shorter animal.

Good luck!

J/K/L: pick up and drop animal on the pile.
R: reset

You have to click the game to start it once it has loaded.
